General.Name: UVAT Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: UVAT Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design and development of physical vapor deposition equipment and coating machines in Taiwan and internationally. It offers sputtering equipment for use in solar panels, touch screens, semiconductor, plasma treatment, optical and automotive industry, passive component, and LED fields. The company also provides OEM coating services comprising appearance coating, such as SDC, nonconductive vacuum metallization/NMVM, and color and optical coating; functional film coatings, including electromagnetic interference coating, AR coating, AF/AS coating, IC carrier, heat dissipating substrates, barrier layer, and mirror-3D projection, as well as offers coating services for the LED industry. In addition, it offers coating services for touch screen industry consisting of indium-tin-oxide and touch module circuits; and biotechnology industry, which include bio sensors, as well as anti-fingerprint film coating services. UVAT Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.51, Housheng Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 338
